SEARCH
Package com.soebes.itf.jupiter.extension

Class MavenCLIOptions

java.lang.Object
com.soebes.itf.jupiter.extension.MavenCLIOptions
@API(status=EXPERIMENTAL, since="0.9.0") public final class MavenCLIOptions extends Object
The different command line options which are supported by Apache Maven.
Author:
Karl Heinz Marbaise
